description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，前中国共产党中央委员会总书记胡锦涛的夫人，曾任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Hu Jintao, and former deputy director of the Beijing Municipal Commission of Urban Planning.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清的儿子，现任中华人民共和国民政部副部长。
description.en: Son of Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing, currently serving as Vice Minister of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一配偶

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人配偶的非正式头衔。
description.en: The informal title for the spouse of the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。
description.en: A major public research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的著名中学。
description.en: A renowned secondary school located in Chongqing, China.

nodes.id: 北京市城乡规划委员会

zh-cn: 北京市城乡规划委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责北京市城市规划工作的政府机构。
description.en: A government agency responsible for urban planning in Beijing.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾经存在的政府部门，负责水利和电力事务。
description.en: A former government ministry of the People's Republic of China responsible for water resources and electric power.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家旅游服务企业。
description.en: A travel service company in China.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清的舅舅，曾任光明日报总编辑。
description.en: Liu Yongqing's uncle, former editor-in-chief of Guangming Daily.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清的姐姐，曾任北京市社科院副院长、党总支副书记。
description.en: Liu Yongqing's sister, former vice president and deputy party secretary of the Beijing Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国务院总理李鹏的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市委书记、全国政协主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of Beijing and Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 胡海青的丈夫，前新浪董事长。
description.en: Husband of Hu Haiqing, former chairman of Sina Corp.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国民政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门之一，主管社会行政事务。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for social and administrative affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的山东省行政区划。
description.en: The administrative division of Shandong Province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主管主办的全国性综合性党报。
description.en: A national comprehensive newspaper supervised and sponsored by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西南地区设立的中央局。
description.en: A Central Bureau established by the Communist Party of China in the Southwest region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家网络公司。
description.en: A Chinese online media company.

description.zh-cn: 美国前总统乔治·沃克·布什的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former U.S. President George W. Bush.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记江泽民的夫人。
description.en: Wife of former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记习近平的夫人。
description.en: Wife of current General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛与刘永清是清华大学水利系1959年级同班同学。
description.en: Hu Jintao and Liu Yongqing were classmates in the Class of 1959 in the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国第一配偶
北京市城乡规划委员会
中华人民共和国水利电力部

position.zh-cn: 水利水电施工研究所工作人员
position.en: Staff at the Water Conservancy and Hydropower Construction Research Institute

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，刘永清被下放到宁夏青铜峡的五七干校。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Yongqing was sent down to the May Seventh Cadre School in Qingtongxia, Ningxia.

description.zh-cn: 常芝青是刘永清的舅舅。
description.en: Chang Zhiqing is Liu Yongqing's maternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，刘永清与时任美国第一夫人劳拉·布什在白宫会面。
description.en: In 2006, Liu Yongqing met with then-U.S. First Lady Laura Bush at the White House.

description.zh-cn: 刘永清以胡锦涛夫人身份首次亮相，迎接时任美国总统比尔·克林顿访华。
description.en: Liu Yongqing made her first public appearance as the wife of Hu Jintao to welcome then-U.S. President Bill Clinton during his visit to China.

description.zh-cn: 两人是重庆巴蜀中学的校友。
description.en: They were schoolmates at Chongqing Bashu Secondary School.

description.zh-cn: 文本提及常芝青与姚依林交好。
description.en: The text mentions that Chang Zhiqing had a good relationship with Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 常芝青被描述为邓小平的地下红人，受其信任。
description.en: Chang Zhiqing was described as an underground contact of Deng Xiaoping, trusted by him.

position.en: Vice President and Deputy Secretary of the Party General Branch

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国民政部

description.zh-cn: 在刘永清担任北京市城乡规划委员会副主任的时期，贾庆林是时任中共北京市委书记，为刘永清的上级领导。
description.en: During Liu Yongqing's tenure as Deputy Director of the Beijing Municipal Commission of Urban Planning, Jia Qinglin was the then-serving Party Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee, making him Liu's superior.
